roleset.name: to cause (a cell) to undergo genetic transformation

example.text: We and others have found that FGF8b can transform the midbrain into a cerebellum fate, whereas FGF8a can promote midbrain development.
example.fdg:
1 We we cc:>3 @SUBJ %NH PRON PERS NOM PL1 2 and and cc:>3 @CC %CC CC 3 others other subj:>4 @SUBJ %NH PRON NOM PL 4 have have v-ch:>5 @+FAUXV %AUX V PRES 5 found find main:>0 @-FMAINV %VA EN 6 that that pm:>9 @CS %CS CS 7 FGF8b fgf8b subj:>8 @SUBJ %NH N NOM SG 8 can can v-ch:>9 @+FAUXV %AUX V AUXMOD 9 transform transform obj:>5 @-FMAINV %VA V INF 10 the the det:>11 @DN> %>N DET 11 midbrain midbrain obj:>9 @OBJ %NH N NOM SG 12 into into goa:>9 @ADVL %EH PREP 13 a a det:>15 @DN> %>N DET SG 14 cerebellum cerebellum attr:>15 @A> %>N N NOM SG 15 fate fate pcomp:>12 @

20 @CS %CS CS 18 FGF8a fgf8a subj:>19 @SUBJ %NH N NOM SG 19 can can v-ch:>20 @+FAUXV %AUX V AUXMOD 20 promote promote cnd:>9 @-FMAINV %VA V INF 21 midbrain midbrain attr:>22 @A> %>N N NOM SG 22 development development obj:>20 @OBJ %NH N NOM SG 23 STOPPOINT

example.text: This construct was transformed into the yeast strain HF7c (Clontech).
example.fdg:
2 construct construct subj:>3 @SUBJ %NH N NOM SG 3 was be v-ch:>4 @+FAUXV %AUX V PAST 4 transformed transform main:>0 @-FMAINV %VP EN 5 into into goa:>4 @ADVL %EH PREP 6 the the det:>9 @DN> %>N DET 7 yeast yeast attr:>8 @A> %>N N NOM SG 8 strain strain attr:>9 @A> %>N N NOM SG 9 HF7c hf7c pcomp:>5 @

9 @NH %NH N NOM SG 12 ) ) 13 STOPPOINT

example.text: For expression of the recombinant protein, pET28a-5 was transformed into Escherichia coli strain BL21(DE3).

roleset.name: to transfer gene from source organism into target organism

example.text: The DNA of budded viruses (BVs) was used to transform E.coli.
example.fdg:
1 The the det:>2 @DN> %>N DET 2 DNA dna subj:>9 @SUBJ %NH ABBR NOM SG 3 of of mod:>2 @5 @A> %>N A ABS 5 viruses virus pcomp:>3 @

5 @NH %NH N NOM SG 8 ) ) 9 was be v-ch:>10 @+FAUXV %AUX V PAST 10 used use main:>0 @-FMAINV %VP EN 11 to to pm:>12 @INFMARK> %AUX INFMARK> 12 transform transform cnt:>10 @-FMAINV %VA V INF 13 E. e. attr:>14 @A> %>N N NOM SG 14 coli coli obj:>12 @OBJ %NH N NOM SG 15 STOPPOINT

example.text: Expression plasmids of the combinations indicated (central panel) were transformed into yeast and selected for by growth on plates lacking leucine and tryptophan (left panel).

12 @CC %CC CC 16 selected select cc:>12 @-FMAINV %VP EN 17 for for ha:>16 @ADVL %EH PREP 18 by by mod:>17 @ADVL %EH PREP 19 growth growth pcomp:>18 @

example.text: To generate GST fusion proteins, the relevant DNA fragments were cloned into pGex2T(Pharmacia) and transformed into the bacterial strains BL21 or TOPP (Stratagene).
example.arg: [into] the bacterial strains BL21 or TOPP (Stratagene)
example.fdg:
1 Bacterial bacterial cc:>3 @A> %>N A ABS 2 and and cc:>3 @CC %CC CC 3 in vitro in vitro attr:>4 @A> %>N A ABS 4 protein protein attr:>5 @A> %>N N NOM SG 5 expression expression @NH %NH N NOM SG @SUBJ %NH N NOM SG @PCOMPL-S %NH N NOM SG 6 To to pm:>7 @INFMARK> %AUX INFMARK> 7 generate generate mod:>5 @-FMAINV %VA V INF 8 GST gst attr:>9 @A> %>N ABBR NOM SG 9 fusion fusion attr:>10 @A> %>N N NOM SG 10 proteins protein obj:>7 @OBJ %NH N NOM PL 11 , , 12 the the det:>15 @DN> %>N DET 13 relevant relevant attr:>14 @A> %>N A ABS 14 DNA dna attr:>15 @A> %>N ABBR NOM SG 15 fragments fragment subj:>16 @SUBJ %NH N NOM PL 16 were be v-ch:>17 @+FAUXV %AUX V PAST PL 17 cloned clone @-FMAINV %VP EN 18 into into ha:>17 @ADVL %EH PREP 19 pGex2T pgex2t pcomp:>18 @

N NOM SG 20 ( ( 21 Pharmacia pharmacia mod:>19 @NH %NH N NOM SG 22 ) ) 23 and and cc:>17 @CC %CC CC 24 transformed transform cc:>17 @-FMAINV %VP EN 25 into into ha:>24 @ADVL %EH PREP 26 the the det:>28 @DN> %>N DET 27 bacterial bacterial attr:>28 @A> %>N A ABS 28 strains strain pcomp:>25 @
